review_data.title: Yummy food and friendly service
review_data.content: We had a quick meal here on a whirlwind trip to Zurich. The wait staff were happy to serve us an English menu and served up my daughter a yummy hot chocolate with extra whipped cream. we had the pasta carbonara with a cold beer...More

review_data.title: Servicio muy desagradable
review_data.content: Desagradable y vergonzoso e indignante (Desagradable camarera Una mujer de complexión muy robusta, morena y de pelo corto). Nos acercamos...More

review_data.title: normal
